io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.audio

Class AudioManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.audio.AudioManager

  • public final class AudioManager
extends java.lang.Object

    A class for managing audio. This class acts as a wrapper around the paulscode sound system. system. The following formats are supported: .ogg, .wav, .xm, .mod, .s3m.

    Sounds are mapped as strings to urls locating audio files. They are only loaded once they are played. Music will be streamed. Volumes canm be set for different categories of sounds.

    For most audio settings (pitch & volume) the default value is 1 representing normal pitch and full volume. When sound positions are set they are assumed to be in real world coordinates.

    Author:
    Tomaso2468

                                float range)
        Adjusts the pitch by a random amount with a range either side of base.
        Parameters:
        base - The base pitch (usually 1)
        range - The range (on either side) of the pitch that will be possible.

        A float value.

      • playSound

        public static java.lang.String playSound(java.lang.String name,
                                         float v,
                                         float p,
                                         float x,
                                         float y,
                                         float z,
                                         boolean loop,
                                         float dx,
                                         float dy,
                                         float dz)
        Plays a sound at a specified location with a pitch, volume and velocity.
        Parameters:
        name - The sound ID to play.
        v - The volume of the sound.
        p - The pitch of the sound.
        x - The position of the sound (horizontal).
        y - The position of the sound (vertical).
        z - The position of the sound (depth).
        loop - Set to true if the sound should be looped.
        dx - The horizontal velocity of the sound.
        dy - The vertical velocity of the sound.
        dz - The depth velocity of the sound.
        Returns:
        The internal sound ID.

        z - The position of the sound (depth).
        dx - The horizontal velocity of the sound.
        dy - The vertical velocity of the sound.
        dz - The depth velocity of the sound.
        Returns:
        The internal sound ID.
